member.name: T:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController
member.summary: Get the weather for any location

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController.GetByCoordinates(System.Double,System.Double)

member.name: M:ClimaMundi.Api.Controllers.WeatherController.GetByLocation(System.String)
